post.body: awwww...that makes me sad. lots of things happening here but c'ville is probably going to be my only stop. miss you lady!
C'ville? Please say yes.
what kind of other stuff?
have a child. it'll be fun.
i did...too funny. thank you! :p
hiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiigh wifey!!!!!! :p
depends on where it is...i hear kuwait smells like farts tho.
wifey!
no. my friends don't suck at all. i love you all.
silly thinking, indeed...i'm going to text you my new number...keep an eye out!
i used to ride that bus from college to home years ago...what a flashback.
i'm still following you! can't wait for c'ville!
it's a CNY thing.
dough, sauce, parmesan cheese, served cold - amazing http://www.geddesbakery.biz/Images/tompie.jpg
nope. not using anything. i'm pretty sure my boyfrined might dump me soon. eek.
i would LOVE a cigarette...such is the life of a quitter.
you rock :D
You should post that on the WH
i am cranky and i don't see it getting any better anytime soon.
i'm too sexy for my tweets!
son of a B!
life is about to get a lot more interesting.
babies babies everywhere!
i am fat and broken out and my nails are chipping. there is a foot of snow on the ground. i am not having fun.
there are 2 dozen donuts in my office. they are not on my diet. dammit.
my place of employment smells like chemicals. that is not good.
headache...5 days running. this is going to be interesting.
in the face of adversity i have found love.
my mind is blown.
i'm soooo not in the mood to be at work today. someone come save me!
i was wrong...yoga tomorrow...of the bikram variety. apparently i'm getting my ass kicked tomorrow. 5:30 will come very quickly.
Merry Christmas Eve, peeps!
i used to find people much funnier when i drank. sober kelly thinks you suck.
anybody have an all natural remedy for a wicked bad headache?
i love bananas. even 5 day old bananas.
ain't karma a bitch? :D
life is good, bad, crazy, boring, infuriating and blissful.
it's snowing like crazy here and instead of going home i'm sttting here waiting for my coworkers to stop eating tomato pie. WTF?
day 11 - cigarette free. the bitchiness is subsiding but not by much. sorry guys.
where did my christmas spirit go? i miss it :(
